channel.title: Courses on Valentin Danchev
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Valentin Danchev

item.title: Reproducible Data Science with Open Source Python Tools and Real-World Data
item.description: This open textbook uses real-world social data sets related to the COVID-19 pandemic to provide an accessible introduction to open, reproducible, and ethical data analysis using hands-on Python Jupyter coding, modern open-source computational tools, and data science techniques.
